name: Shadow over Normoth
description:
Taking inspiration from PS1 classics like Resident Evil and Silent Hill, Shadow over Normoth sets out to bring you back to the original survival horror experience. With fixed cameras, tank controls and visuals that are reminiscent of the good old days, you will truly feel like it's 1996 again.

 

Unravel the mystery behind the town of Normoth, gather resources and survive the horrors of this forsaken place. You will once again enter the world of survival horror ... good luck!

     

   

 

This game was made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers 2021 where I challenged myself to make a classic survival horror game in just 30 days. While this game certainly has some rough edges (which is to be expected from a game jam game) I hope that you will still have a great time with it. Please don't hesitate to contact me if you find any game breaking bugs or if you're having other technical issues.

   

   

Also, huge thanks to Mario Acero (aka SilentDrumr) for providing me with such great SFX and Music and helping me to playtest this thing :)

You can checkout the full OST here:

https://silentdrumr.bandcamp.com/album/shadow-over-normoth-original-soundtrack

   

   

The game and all its assets were created by me during the jam period with the following exceptions:

- Music and SFX by Mario Acero (SilentDrumr)

- 8-bit Arcade Font by Damien Gosset (https://www.dafont.com/damien-gosset.d971)

- Gentium Font by SIL International (https://www.dafont.com/sil-international.d1295)

- Haunt AOE Font by Astigmatic One Eye Typographic Institute (https://www.dafont.com/astigmatic-one-eye-typographic-institute.d62)

- Nokia FC Font by  Zeh Fernando (https://www.dafont.com/zeh-jose-fernando-baldo-caneiro.d467)
